Activity: Review the existing sound effect library and the environmental sounds collected so far.
Focus on UI Feedback sounds (button clicks, menu navigation, error messages). Brainstorm ideas for UI sounds.
Research UI sound libraries and identify sounds that match the game's style. Download potential candidates.
@UIUX-1 (UI/UX Designer) Discuss the specific UI elements that need sound effects. Topic: UI feedback sounds and their integration
Edit downloaded UI sounds. Modify them to fit the game's aesthetic.
Experiment with creating custom UI sounds using audio editing software.
Test the edited and created UI sounds within the game engine. Get initial feedback.
Backup UI sounds and update the sound effect list. Note down any changes needed based on the initial testing.
